entry.content: I've been an active blogger since 2011 up until 2016 where I talked about various things – life events, some tech stuff and my scholarship interview experiences. I stopped blogging when I started my International Baccalaureate (IB) diploma program. Throughout my undergraduate years, I channel most of my writing energy answering IB questions on Quora and writing my notes using LaTeX. Today, I've decided to start blogging again, focusing on math, statistics and ML.
